summary: Research completed on LaTeX aux file corruption in continuous builds, subfile compilation workflow, and VimTeX configuration. Key findings: corruption occurs from interrupted builds in -pvc mode; use single-shot compilation and VimtexToggleMain for subfile-specific builds; current project structure supports independent chapter compilation.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive research report covering aux file corruption root causes, subfiles package usage, latexmk configuration improvements, VimTeX workflow recommendations, and large LaTeX project best practices

next_steps: Run /plan 483 to create implementation plan for VimTeX configuration changes and latexmkrc improvements
